text: ibrahim va ohu ge paramadhipati vadan kihipayakin piriksuma ta lak kala avastha va (sihipat karanu.) evita ohu eva sampurna kale ya. sæbævin ma mama numba va janaya ta meheyum karuveku lesa pat karannemi yæyi ohu (allah) pævasiya. mage parapurin da (ese pat karanu mænava!) yæyi ohu (ibrahim) pævasiya. aparadhakaruvan ta mage givisuma himi novanne yæyi ohu pævasiya
